title: Homestead National Monument of America: Fees & Passes
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Fees & Passes              Fees & Passes       There is no fee to visit Homestead National Monument of America. Entrance to grounds, visitor centers, parking areas, and special events are all free. Enjoy your visit!  If you plan to visit other parks that do charge an entrance fee, you can pick up an America the Beautiful Interagency Pass at Homestead National Monument of America. Learn more about the pass program. Also, learn about fee-free days in the national parks.
